title: Plans unveiled for proposed £2m revamp of Astley Primary School (Norfolk County Council)
text: ( Source : Norfolk County Council ) 08 October 2015 A Norfolk primary school could be transformed to create more places and modernise classrooms. Astley Primary School has been earmarked for an estimated £2m capital project, with a new
